channel.title: T2 error, npc updating
channel.description:
Both servers are 317 and the same base, but I'm trying to get the cleaner version to connect to the server, and when it logs in I get everything that normally, but right before the game screen is about to load, the client disconnects and gives this error.
Error: T2 - [b]65[/b],81,73 - 215,3086,3496 - 0,0,5,93,7,-76,0,33,-96,71,-16,0,-46,49,1 17,-64,4,-71,64,3,0,22,-25,0,-108,0,107,-92,1,48,1,-18,-80,10,64,8,-69,64,43,0,3 9,-124,7,-92,0,-80,-7,6,-48,4, Floor Map Loaded: 110 Object Map Loaded: 111 Floor Map Loaded: 112 Object Map Loaded: 113 Floor Map Loaded: 114 Object Map Loaded: 115 Floor Map Loaded: 622 Object Map Loaded: 623 Floor Map Loaded: 624 Object Map Loaded: 625 Floor Map Loaded: 626 Object Map Loaded: 627
It's to do with npc loading, but how can I overcome this error? [code]packet id, int, int - packet size, xpos, ypos - ...[/code] [b]Solution[/b]: Change npc bits both server and client side so they match, otherwise they're sending a different amount of bits which causes the crash.

item.title: T2 error, npc updating
item.dc:creator: @jessewhitley jessewhitley
item.description:
@jessewhitley wrote:

Change the npc bits in the client as same as server.

Read full topic

item.title: T2 error, npc updating
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Both servers are 317 and the same base, but I’m trying to get the cleaner version to connect to the server, and when it logs in I get everything that normally, but right before the game screen is about to load, the client disconnects and gives this error.

Error: T2 - [b]65[/b],81,73 - 215,3086,3496 - 0,0,5,93,7,-76,0,33,-96,71,-16,0,-46,49,1 17,-64,4,-71,64,3,0,22,-25,0,-108,0,107,-92,1,48,1,-18,-80,10,64,8,-69,64,43,0,3 9,-124,7,-92,0,-80,-7,6,-48,4, Floor Map Loaded: 110 Object Map Loaded: 111 Floor Map Loaded: 112 Object Map Loaded: 113 Floor Map Loaded: 114 Object Map Loaded: 115 Floor Map Loaded: 622 Object Map Loaded: 623 Floor Map Loaded: 624 Object Map Loaded: 625 Floor Map Loaded: 626 Object Map Loaded: 627

It’s to do with npc loading, but how can I overcome this error?

Solution: Change npc bits both server and client side so they match, otherwise they’re sending a different amount of bits which causes the crash.

Read full topic
